medium.q: I am a word of letters three; add two, and fewer there will be. What word am I?
medium.hint: Think of a small amount and how it changes with two letters added.

hard.q: A box has four corners. Inside is a square. If you move one corner to the opposite side, you still have a symmetrical shape. What shape could this be describing?
hard.hint: Consider a shape with equal sides and a bow-like balance along a diagonal.
